experience.title: Data Science Analyst
experience.description: • Managed chargeback losses and decline rates for Checkout products in Mexico by implementing Decision Tree based strategic and merchant-specific decline and enablement rules.• Automated multiple alerts using Python for real-time and offline monitoring of KPIs, TPV, model scores, issuer concentrations, IP or email velocity and other fraudulent patterns to identify anomalous behaviour.• Successfully onboarded 20+ large merchants on an unbranded checkout product with a yearly TPV of $150M by actively collaborating with various cross-functional teams.
experience.description_html: • Managed chargeback losses and decline rates for Checkout products in Mexico by implementing Decision Tree based strategic and merchant-specific decline and enablement rules.• Automated multiple alerts using Python for real-time and offline monitoring of KPIs, TPV, model scores, issuer concentrations, IP or email velocity and other fraudulent patterns to identify anomalous behaviour.• Successfully onboarded 20+ large merchants on an unbranded checkout product with a yearly TPV of $150M by actively collaborating with various cross-functional teams.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Generated monthly customer lists for targeted cross-selling of newly acquired Kabbage products based on the customers’ previous spending, industry, revenue, and other compliance checks, driving $30M/year in loan volume.• Evaluated A/B tests using chi-squared test to identify email strategy with a 57% better application rate.• Identified ideal customer profile for a line of credit product for US small businesses by segmenting customers based on profitability, risk factors, spending behaviour, and engagement with existing American Express products.
experience.description_html: • Generated monthly customer lists for targeted cross-selling of newly acquired Kabbage products based on the customers’ previous spending, industry, revenue, and other compliance checks, driving $30M/year in loan volume.• Evaluated A/B tests using chi-squared test to identify email strategy with a 57% better application rate.• Identified ideal customer profile for a line of credit product for US small businesses by segmenting customers based on profitability, risk factors, spending behaviour, and engagement with existing American Express products.

experience.title: Summer Analyst
experience.description: • Developed a model to identify growing small businesses based on third-party review data, utilizing 50+ variables.• Applied XGBoost to identify restaurants for prospects targeting, achieving 0.84 AUC on the validation set.
